are you i386 or x64

once the file is downloaded, run ar x dpkg_1.16.0~ubuntu7_amd64.deb

have you done ar x dpkg_1.16.0~ubuntu7_amd64.deb
ok now you should have two files in the folder. control.tar.gz and data.tar.gz
just uncompress data.tar.gz using: tar -zxvf data.tar.gz
